_comment: Created by EFisher on 25/02/2014 18:19:57 using v2.0
title: Perceptions of the quality of care for community mental health services in 2013
analysis_commentary: This survey asked people to rate their overall care experiences on a scale from zero to 10. Three quarters of the respondents felt positive about their overall care experience, with 75% scoring it as 6 or above. However, 14% of respondents scored their overall care as 4 or below.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Community Mental Health Survey
